name: getSapHanaDbRecoverableRanges
description: Retrieve the recoverable ranges for a specified SAP HANA database. Provide a beginning and/or ending timestamp to retrieve only the recoverable ranges that fall within this period of time.

id.description: ID of the SAP HANA database.

after_time.description: Filter ranges to end after this time. The date-time string should be in an ISO8601 format. For example, "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678Z".

before_time.description: Filter ranges to start before this time. The date-time string should be in an ISO8601 format. For example, "2016-01-01T01:23:45.678Z".
